locality: South Fork of the Clearwater River, off Highway 14 at the South Fork Campground.

Dworshak Reservoir, hillside southeast of North Fork Clearwater River, across river from Ahsahka, about 1/2 mile east northeast of confluence with Middle Fork Clearwater River.
Mosquito Bay, northeast corner of Priest Lake.
Coeur d\\'Alene Mountains, Farragut State Park.
